Text: TRUNEWS 10/31/16 Dr. Lance Wallnau | Answered Prayer: The Cabal Crumbles October 31, 2016 Is the new FBI investigation into Hillary Rodham Clinton God’s answer to His saints? Today on TRUNEWS, Rick Wiles expands on James Comey’s Friday announcement, and the scandalous tie in with long time aide, and Muslim Brotherhood darling, Huma Abedin. Pastor Rick also speaks with Dr. Lance Wallnau regarding the Lord’s use of Donald Trump as a spiritual wrecking ball in The Body of Christ. Edward Szall provides updates on the latest from WikiLeaks, and Fior Hernandez details the major spiritual shift occurring in the pews of America as Election Day approaches. Today’s Audio Streamcast.
